mean_cn: n. 叫卖的小贩，小商人，零售商；  v. 叫卖，讨价还价
mean_en: someone who sells or advertises something in an aggressive, dishonest, or annoying way
sentence: The despicable huckster used a fake gold statue to deceive the old man.
sentence_trans: 这个卑鄙的黑心小贩用假冒金塑像来欺骗这个老人。
word_etyma: huck粗麻布 + ster表人 → 穿粗麻布的人 → huckster叫卖小贩
